name: BeelStarmon
effect: When playing this card from your hand, reduce its play cost by 1 for each [Three Musketeers] Digimon card and Option card with a memory cost of 7 in your trash.[On Play] Return 1 Option card with a memory cost of 7 from your trash to your hand. Then, use 1 Option card with a memory cost of 7 in your hand without paying its memory cost.
